name: Drunken Dead
description:
GDKO R2, gnoj8, BossRushJam2023 submission

 

As a bartender, you should be a good listener, your customers always have something to tell. But as a bartender during the zombie apocalypse you should also "take care" of those unfortunate ones. 

Make makeshift shots and make it through your night shift 

It is not appropriate or legal to serve alcohol to customers who are under the influence or appear to be impaired, including if they have turned into zombies. Additionally, serving alcohol to zombies would not be a viable business strategy. It’s important to follow all laws and regulations regarding the service and consumption of alcohol.

Customer orders and their seats are stored in the cash machine interface, on the right side of the counter. Seat numbers: from 1 to 5 - from left to right of the counter.

To make a drink use a bar shelf behind.

To change the music playing use the music box on the left

 

Controls 

Q - switch from serving drinks to customers to shooting zombies 

E - use 

AWSD - movement

mouse - camera
